greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = n*(A000041(n-k)) read by rows, k>=0.
comment: The same as A182700, but without the last term of row n.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5050 (First 100 rows)
program: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {for (n = 1, nn, for (k = 0, n-1, print1(n*numbpart(n-k), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 13 2014
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 28 2010
